body: So I really did read this a month ago hahahah I was wondering why this wasn't on my faves but now I know. Last time I was here I wasn't in it for this because of the dialogue but give a horny man some time and Voila!
@ekiz Hanamaru, Ruby and Yoshiko do appear on the last 2 pages tho.
they removed from the tags the other girls that do not appear here, good job

Personally, i enjoy sleep sex for the girls' reactions and realization that they got raped afterward. It makes me feel so good, like "gotcha", or "surprise!" but more on perverted way (idk if it makes sense). Sleeping hentais with out aftermath reactions is just pathetic and trash i agree. Gore and Scat are just shit for hateful people in general

The illustrations are excellent, but I can't understand wtf is wrong w/ the Japanese male populace.  Raping girls while they're asleep/drugged is so common it's practically the default story arch.  Do they hate themselves so much that they can't even fantasize about women wanting to be with them?  Tbh there are arguments for normal rape scenarios, but the drug/sleep thing is just slimy.  It's like gore and scat, I'll just never understand it.
This one was a hmmmm, the dialogue is a bit...
